com.intel.icecp.core.permissions

Class NodePermission

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.security.Permission
      • com.intel.icecp.core.permissions.BasePermission
        • com.intel.icecp.core.permissions.NodePermission
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Guard

    public class NodePermission
extends BasePermission
    Control access to the device; each permission will have an action in [network, read, write]. The current implementation also allows using wildcards (i.e. *) to match either any device name (e.g. "*") or to match the device name prefix (e.g. "/intel/device/*"). For example, to check read and write access to /my/device run something like: 
    
 Permission permission = new NodePermission("/my/device", "read,write");
 SecurityManager sm = System.getSecurityManager();
 if (sm != null) {
 sm.checkPermission(permission);
 }
    See Also:
